Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Home 22H6 Build 19045.3086 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz | GPU: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1660 Ti | RAM: 32 GB

 

Identical vessel docked, fuel transferred from one vessel to another. Within seconds after fuel transfer completed, vessels start shaking violently and spinning faster and faster (gyros were on). Shaking similar in appearance  to "kraken attack" in KSP1 when attaching solar panels to robotic hinges. Undocked ships to stop increased shaking; both vessels ended up spaghettified with parts stretched out over long distances.
